      • createTestCompleteDirectory

        protected static junit.framework.TestSuite createTestCompleteDirectory(String name,
                                                                       String testRootPath,
                                                                       Class testCase,
                                                                       String... extensions)
                                                                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                       InstantiationException,
                                                                       IllegalAccessException,
                                                                       InvocationTargetException,
                                                                       SecurityException,
                                                                       NoSuchMethodException
        Utility method to create a test suite from files
        Parameters:
        name - the suite name
        testRootPath - the root folder to start the file search
        testCase - The test case class instantiated. It must have a constructor taking a File
        extensions - an array of accepted extensions. If none are given all files are accepted. Empty sequence for the empty extension.
        Returns:
        a new test suite
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException
        InvocationTargetException
        SecurityException
        NoSuchMethodException

      • createTestCompleteFile

        protected static junit.framework.TestSuite createTestCompleteFile(String name,
                                                                  String testRootPath,
                                                                  Class testCase,
                                                                  String... extensions)
                                                           throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                  InstantiationException,
                                                                  IllegalAccessException,
                                                                  InvocationTargetException,
                                                                  SecurityException,
                                                                  NoSuchMethodException
        Utility method to create a test suite from files
        Parameters:
        name - the suite name
        testRootPath - the root folder to start the file search
        testCase - The test case class instantiated. It must have a constructor taking a File or a File, String and File
        extensions - an array of accepted extensions. If none are given all files are accepted. Empty sequence for the empty extension.
        Returns:
        a new test suite
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException
        InvocationTargetException
        SecurityException
        NoSuchMethodException

                                                                    InstantiationException,
                                                                    IllegalAccessException,
                                                                    InvocationTargetException,
                                                                    SecurityException,
                                                                    NoSuchMethodException,
                                                                    IOException
        Utility method to create a test suite from files
        Parameters:
        name - the suite name
        testRootPath - the root folder to start the file search
        testCase - The test case class instantiated. It must have a constructor taking a File, String and String
        extensions - an array of accepted extensions. If none are given all files are accepted. Empty sequence for the empty extension.
        Returns:
        a new test suite
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException
        InvocationTargetException
        SecurityException
